page.title: 07Westcliff Estate.
page.content: Westcliff is about 24 years old. I live in Ripon Close just in front of Scotter Road. All of the houses are joined together. West of Scotter Road there are woods and Brumby Common Nature Reserve. Westcliffe is scattered about with litter which spoils it. Vandals pull out planks of wood from fences and write on walls. There is a good side to Westcliffe the people are friendly and helpful. There are a lot of trees and grassy places which children can play on and the shops aren't far away. Scotter Road is in use 24 hours a day. From the sirens, it seems as if there is always an ambulance, fire engine or police car going down the road.
